column2: (ED:H) Invite a random fellow Hermetic to Stargazing
A random fellow Hermetic will be chosen, and you will invite them to stargazing with you. (Priority will be given to people who are more likely to lead to a favourable outcome.)
Is NOT §Yincapable, inaccessible or otherwise busy§!
Has NOT recently sent an invitation to stargazing (cooldown expires §Y[Root.inviting_to_stargazing.GetExpiryDate]§!)
Has NOT invited to stargazing in the past three years (cooldown expires §Y[Root.stargazing_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!)
The month is between §YFebruary§! and §YAugust§! (to ensure good weather)
There is at least one valid guest, with mutual opinion >= 0
An §YInvitation to Stargazing§! will be sent to a fellow Hermetic
